title: Question 32
description: What are senior and junior tranches?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
Senior and junior tranches will be available in our main products - SMART Alpha & SMART Bonds. 

In the meantime we're distributing $BOND tokens to the community running Yield Farming & LP Incentivization programs. You can learn more in our [Medium article](https://medium.com/barnbridge/barnbridge-this-is-houston-you-are-go-for-launch-b92e29a7dd20).
